verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: Undoubtedly, We sent it down in the blessed and valuable night.
verse.verse_2: And what did you know, what the blessed night is?
verse.verse_3: The blessed and valuable Night is better than a thousand months.
verse.verse_4: Therein descend angels and Jibril (the Spirit) by the command of their Lord for every affiar.'
verse.verse_5: That is all peace till the rising of the dawn.
